Package loadero.main

Class LoaderoClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • loadero.main.LoaderoClient
  • public final class LoaderoClient
extends Object
    Main entry point of the interaction with the Loadero API. Cannot be extended.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LoaderoClient​(String baseUrl, String loaderApiToken, int projectId)
      Constructs LoaderoClient object for a specific Loadero project.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoaderoClient

        public LoaderoClient​(String baseUrl,
                     String loaderApiToken,
                     int projectId)
        Constructs LoaderoClient object for a specific Loadero project.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - Base url of Loadero API i.e. https://api.loadero.com/v2
        loaderApiToken - Loadero API token for your account.
        projectId - ID of the project we want to work with.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if baseUrl or loaderoApiToken is null or an empty String.
        LoaderoClientInternalException - if projectId is a negative number.

      • getTestOptionsById

        public LoaderoTestOptions getTestOptionsById​(int testId)
        Returns information about test as LoaderoTestOptions.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of desired test.
        Returns:
        LoaderoTestOptions object.

      • updateTestOptionsById

        public LoaderoTestOptions updateTestOptionsById​(int testId,
                                                LoaderoTestOptions newTestOptions)
        Updates the existing Loadero test description based on the parameters provided in new LoaderoTestOptions() object.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of test to be updated.
        newTestOptions - new LoaderoTestOptions object with parameters that you wish to change
        Returns:
        Updated LoaderoTestOptions

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        - Newly created LoaderoTestOption object

      • deleteTestById

        public void deleteTestById​(int id)
        Deletes test with given ID from Loadero.
        Parameters:
        id - - ID of the test to be removed.

      • getTestScriptById

        public LoaderoScriptFileLoc getTestScriptById​(int fileId)
        Retrieves content of the script file from Loadero API and returns as LoaderoScriptFileLoc object. Use toString() to convert into actual script.
        Parameters:
        fileId - ID of the script file
        Returns:
        LoaderoScriptFileLoc information about script content.

      • getGroupById

        public LoaderoGroup getGroupById​(int testId,
                                 int groupId)
        Returns group as LoaderoGroup object from Loadero with specified ID.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test.
        groupId - ID of the group.
        Returns:
        LoaderoGroup object.

      • updateGroupById

        public LoaderoGroup updateGroupById​(int testId,
                                    int groupId,
                                    LoaderoGroup newGroup)
        Updates Loadero group parameters by given group ID.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test containing the group.
        groupId - ID of the group to be updated.
        newGroup - LoaderoGroup object with new parameters.
        Returns:
        LoaderoGroup object with updated parameters.

      • createNewGroup

        public LoaderoGroup createNewGroup​(LoaderoGroup newGroup,
                                   int testId)
        Creates new group for specified Test.
        Parameters:
        newGroup - New LoaderoGroup object with provided parameters.
        testId - ID of the test for which we would like to create group.
        Returns:
        Newly created LoaderoGroup object.

      • deleteGroupById

        public void deleteGroupById​(int testId,
                            int groupId)
        Deletes specific group from Loadero for specific test.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test for which we want to delete group.
        groupId - ID of the group we want to delete.

      • getParticipantById

                                             int groupId,
                                             int participantId)
        Returns participant's information from Loadero as LoaderoParticipant object.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test that contains participant.
        groupId - ID of the group containing participant
        participantId - desired participant.
        Returns:
        LoaderoParticipant object

      • updateTestParticipantById

        public LoaderoParticipant updateTestParticipantById​(int testId,
                                                    int groupId,
                                                    int participantId,
                                                    LoaderoParticipant newParticipant)
        Updates Loadero Participant by it's ID.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test that contains participant.
        groupId - ID of the group that contains participant.
        participantId - ID of desired participant.
        newParticipant - LoaderoParticipant object with new params.
        Returns:
        LoaderoParticipant updated LoaderoParticipant object.

      • createParticipantById

        public LoaderoParticipant createParticipantById​(int testId,
                                                int groupId,
                                                LoaderoParticipant newParticipant)
        Creates new participant for specific group in specific test.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test where we want to create participant.
        groupId - ID of the group where we want to create participant.
        newParticipant - LoaderoParticipant object to be created on Loadero site.
        Returns:
        Newly created LoaderoParticipant object from Loadero.

      • deleteParticipantById

        public void deleteParticipantById​(int testId,
                                  int groupId,
                                  int participantId)
        Deletes specific participant.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test containing participant.
        groupId - ID of the group containing participant.
        participantId - ID of the participant we want to delete.

      • getTestRunResultById

        public LoaderoTestRunResult getTestRunResultById​(int testId,
                                                 int runId)
        Gets information about all test run results from Loadero API.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the desired test to get results from.
        runId - ID of the test run.
        Returns:
        LoaderoAllTestRunResults object, that contains list of LoaderoSingleTestRunResult objects.

      • getTestRunParticipantResultById

        public LoaderoTestRunParticipantResult getTestRunParticipantResultById​(int testId,
                                                                       int runId,
                                                                       int resultId)
        Gets information about specific results.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test we wish to get results.
        runId - ID of the test run.
        resultId - ID of the result.
        Returns:
        LoaderoSingleTestRunResult object containing information such as ID, status, selenium_status, log paths, asserts and artifacts.

      • startTestAndPollInfo

        public LoaderoRunInfo startTestAndPollInfo​(int testId,
                                           int interval,
                                           int timeout)
        Start test run by sending POST command underneath to tests/testId/runs endpoint. After which actively starts polling for information about test run. Returns run info when test is done or time of the polling runs out.
        Parameters:
        testId - ID of the test that is going to run.
        interval - how often check for information. In seconds.
        timeout - how long should polling for information. In seconds.
        Returns:
        LoaderoRunInfo containing information about test run.
        Throws:
        LoaderoClientInternalException - if interval is less than 5 seconds.
